member.name: M:OxyPlot.WP8.OxyColorConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Modifies the source data before passing it to the target for display in the UI.
member.param: The source data being passed to the target.
The of data expected by the target dependency property.
An optional parameter to be used in the converter logic.
member.returns: The value to be passed to the target dependency property.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.WP8.OxyColorConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Modifies the target data before passing it to the source object. This method is called only in bindings.
member.param: The target data being passed to the source.
The of data expected by the source object.
An optional parameter to be used in the converter logic.
member.returns: The value to be passed to the source object.

member.name: T:OxyPlot.WP8.ThicknessConverter
member.summary: Converts from to the maximum thicknesses.
member.remarks: This is used in the to convert BorderThickness properties to Path.StrokeThickness (double). The maximum thickness value is used.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.WP8.PhoneRenderContext.DrawEllipses(System.Collections.Generic.IList{OxyPlot.OxyRect},OxyPlot.OxyColor,OxyPlot.OxyColor,System.Double)
member.summary: Draws the collection of ellipses, where all have the same stroke and fill. This performs better than calling DrawEllipse multiple times.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.WP8.PhoneRenderContext.DrawLine(System.Collections.Generic.IList{OxyPlot.ScreenPoint},OxyPlot.OxyColor,System.Double,System.Double[],OxyPlot.LineJoin,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws the polyline from the specified points.
member.param: if set to true the shape will be aliased.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.WP8.PhoneRenderContext.DrawLineSegments(System.Collections.Generic.IList{OxyPlot.ScreenPoint},OxyPlot.OxyColor,System.Double,System.Double[],OxyPlot.LineJoin,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws the multiple line segments defined by points (0,1) (2,3) (4,5) etc. This should have better performance than calling DrawLine for each segment.
member.param: if set to true the shape will be aliased.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.WP8.PhoneRenderContext.DrawPolygon(System.Collections.Generic.IList{OxyPlot.ScreenPoint},OxyPlot.OxyColor,OxyPlot.OxyColor,System.Double,System.Double[],OxyPlot.LineJoin,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws the polygon from the specified points. The polygon can have stroke and/or fill.
member.param: if set to true the shape will be aliased.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.WP8.PhoneRenderContext.DrawPolygons(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Collections.Generic.IList{OxyPlot.ScreenPoint}},OxyPlot.OxyColor,OxyPlot.OxyColor,System.Double,System.Double[],OxyPlot.LineJoin,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws a collection of polygons, where all polygons have the same stroke and fill. This performs better than calling DrawPolygon multiple times.
member.param: if set to true the shape will be aliased.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.WP8.PhoneRenderContext.DrawRectangles(System.Collections.Generic.IList{OxyPlot.OxyRect},OxyPlot.OxyColor,OxyPlot.OxyColor,System.Double)
member.summary: Draws a collection of rectangles, where all have the same stroke and fill. This performs better than calling DrawRectangle multiple times.

member.name: T:OxyPlot.WP8.TrackerDefinition
member.remarks: The tracker definitions make it possible to show different trackers for different series. The property is matched with the in the TrackerDefinitions collection in the control.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.WP8.TrackerDefinition.TrackerKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the tracker key.
member.remarks: The Plot will use this property to find the TrackerDefinition that matches the TrackerKey of the current series.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.WP8.TrackerDefinition.TrackerTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the tracker template.
member.remarks: The tracker control will be added/removed from the Tracker overlay as necessary. The DataContext of the tracker will be set to a TrackerHitResult with the current tracker data.
